Header: Discussions tomorrow to settle the customs crisis
Content: A decisive discussion for the resolution of the Customs crisis is slated to take place tomorrow. The discussion will be held between Minister of Finance and Mass Media MangalaSamaraweera and former Customs Director General P.S.M. Charles. It is reported that solutions could be found to work to rule trade union action mooted by the Customs Officers protesting against the transfer of Mrs. Charles after removing her from he position of Customs Director General. This Trade Union action is in place from the 30th of last month.
